name: Skillful World Fixing
description: Take up your role as savior of the world to fix it. You start very small and have to help forests by placing acorns in their corresponding holes (WATCH OUT FOR THE COCKROACHES). After rescuing forests, you place them in a country to bring the green back in countries (WATCH OUT FOR THE RAZOR BLADES). The fixed countries have to be placed on the globe as a final step (WATCH OUT FOR NUCLEAR DANGER). Use the Arrow Buttons to tilt the board.
